bibl.title: The Name Ostraka from Soknopaiou Nesos. Office Lottery or Ostracism in the Fayy没m?
bibl.note: Introduction. - Purpose of the name ostraka. - Identification of persons. - Identification of persons in other documents. - Paleography. - Find circumstances. - Assignment of priestly offices in the Roman period. - Assignment of liturgies in the Roman period. - Summary and conclusion. [The name ostraka (mostly Demotic, a few Greek or bilingual) belong to the temple sphere. They were possibly used in a lottery.]

bibl.title: Das Fayy没m in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike.

bibl.seg: Carolin Arlt, The Name Ostraka from Soknopaiou Nesos. Office Lottery or Ostracism in the Fayy没m?

Carolin Arlt & Martin Andreas Stadler (edd.), unter Mitarbeit von Ulrike Weinmann, Das Fayy没m in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike (Wiesbaden, 2013) pp. 7-17, 4 tabl., 1 plan.

Introduction. - Purpose of the name ostraka. - Identification of persons. - Identification of persons in other documents. - Paleography. - Find circumstances. - Assignment of priestly offices in the Roman period. - Assignment of liturgies in the Roman period. - Summary and conclusion. [The name ostraka (mostly Demotic, a few Greek or bilingual) belong to the temple sphere. They were possibly used in a lottery.]
